tns:patch.author: acartaleanu
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_project_overage;
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_project_overage AS SELECT amp_activity_id, project_overage FROM ( SELECT amp_activity_id, NULLIF((Extract(month from rawdelta) + 12 * Extract(year from rawdelta) ) :: Integer ,'0' ) AS project_overage FROM (SELECT amp_activity_id, age( proposed_completion_date, Now()) AS rawdelta FROM amp_activity_version) AS rawvals) AS computed_vals WHERE project_overage IS NOT NULL;
